description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LambertGroup Multimedia Playlist Slider Addon for WPBakery Page Builder allows Reflected XSS. This issue affects Multimedia Playlist Slider Addon for WPBakery Page Builder: from n/a through 2.1.

product.name: Multimedia Playlist Slider Addon for WPBakery Page Builder
